Class Validacion

java.lang.Object
control.Validacion
public final class Validacion extends Object
Class made to validate data input / Clase para validar entradas

  • Method Details

    • isDatoValido

      public static boolean isDatoValido()
      Gets the validation result
      Returns:
      true if the input data is valid, false otherwise
      Since:
      1.0

    • leerReal

      public static double leerReal(String entrada, String mensajeError, String tituloError)
      Validates a decimal number, accepts a String input, parses it to a double representation, returns it as number if possible and shows an error message catching the exception if not
      Parameters:
      entrada - String representation of a double decimal number to be parsed
      mensajeError - A String that contains a message to show if it is not possible parsing the given entrada
      tituloError - Error title if it is not possible parsing the given entrada
      Returns:
      The double representation of the given entrada if succesfully parsed

    • leerLong

      public static long leerLong(String entrada, String mensajeError, String tituloError)
      Validates a long number, accepts a String input, parses it to a long representation, returns it as number if possible and shows an error message catching the exception if not
      Parameters:
      entrada - String representation of a long number to be parsed
      mensajeError - A String that contains a message to show if it is not possible parsing the given entrada
      tituloError - Error title if it is not possible parsing the given entrada
      Returns:
      The long numeric representation if succesfully parsed

    • leerEntero

      public static int leerEntero(String entrada, String mensajeError, String tituloError)
      Validates a integer number, accepts a String input, parses it to a int representation, returns it as number if possible and shows an error message catching the exception if not
      Parameters:
      entrada - String representation of a integer number to be parsed
      mensajeError - A String that contains a message to show if it is not possible parsing the given entrada
      tituloError - Error title if it is not possible parsing the given entrada
      Returns:
      The int representation of the number if succesfully parsed

    • validarStrings

      public static boolean validarStrings(String strEntradaUsuario, Validacion.TipoEntradaString tipo)
      Validates a String text input, and verifies if it has the right composition structure, shows an error message otherwise
      Parameters:
      strEntradaUsuario - A String that contains the input to be validated
      tipo - TipoEntradaString enum constant that indicates the input type to validate it properly
      Returns:
      true if the input String has a valid admitted text composition structure, false otherwise

    • validarEdad

      public static boolean validarEdad(int edad)
      Validates a client age by calling and trying the method in charge, the age must be greater than 0
      Parameters:
      edad - A client age to validate
      Returns:
      true if the age is valid, false otherwise
      Since:
      1.6
